original_text: “‘If they offer it as an expression of thankfulness, then along with this thank offering they are to offer thick loaves made without yeast and with olive oil mixed in, thin loaves made without yeast and brushed with oil, and thick loaves of the finest flour well-kneaded and with oil mixed in.
korean_text: 만일 그것을 감사함으로 드리려면 기름 섞은 무교병과 기름 바른 무교전병과 고운 가루에 기름 섞어 구운 과자를 그 감사제물과 함께 드리고

sentences.original_text: If they offer it as an expression of thankfulness
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 감사의 표현으로 그것을 드린다면

sentences.original_text: then along with this thank offering
they are to offer thick loaves made without yeast
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 누룩 없이 만든 두꺼운 빵을 드려야 한다

sentences.original_text: and with olive oil mixed in
and thick loaves of the finest flour
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가장 좋은 가루로 만든 두꺼운 빵

sentences.original_text: well-kneaded and with oil mixed in
